text: Ilza Amado Vaz (born 14 February 1961) served as the 18th prime minister of São Tomé and Príncipe from 8 June 2025 . Ilza Amado Vaz unexpectedly resigns as Prime Minister of São Tomé and Príncipe three days after being appointed Prime Minister, with the ruling Independent Democratic Action party proposing to appoint Adelino Pereira to replace Vaz. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Prime Ministers of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:São Tomé and Príncipe people
title: Ilza Amado Vaz
